EmailTemplate.name: Expiration
EmailTemplate.subject: Subscription expires in two days!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear subscriber:
We hope you enjoy Spotiforce and find it useful and enjoyable. We would like to remind you that your subscription expires in 2 days. If you'd like to renew your subscription, click the renewal button on your home page. Do not hesitate to contact us if you have questions, just write to e-mail provided on the contact section.
We hope to have you back soon!
Spotiforce Support Team
